control_classes

Class GameSetUp

  • java.lang.Object
    • control_classes.GameSetUp

  • public class GameSetUp
extends java.lang.Object
    GameSetUp is a class that creates the main game objects. It creates the players, paddles, bricks and walls as well as the ball Created by Jilada on 5/04/17.
